description_for_human: Search and compare 118+ AI tools. Find the best AI software for your needs.
description_for_model: Plugin for searching and retrieving details about AI tools, software, and services from the AI Fuel Hub directory. Use this to find AI tools for specific tasks (e.g., 'writing', 'coding', 'image generation'), compare features, and get pricing information. You can also search for blog posts and guides about AI.
